user_input:
Modify the DHEM model.
                        o	Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastrucutre level (use crud pipeline)
                        o	Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastrucutre level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
                        o	Create a new datafile in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category call it something relating to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited
                        o	Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
                        o	Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step. Use the crud pipeline
                        o	Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the PLEXOS model specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file attribute for the PCIPMI infrastructure level using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate attribute from the following list.

function_args.user_input: Set all non-zero values to 999 and copy the H2\Gas data

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file by setting all non-zero values to 999 and copying the H2\Gas data.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate file from the following list.

tasks.description: Create a new datafile in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category named to reflect PCIPMI capacities Unlimited using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate object from the following list.

tasks.description: Add a new scenario called 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate attribute from the following list.

tasks.description: Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the new datafile and scenario using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate property from the following list.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995', add the new scenario, and rename it to 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline' using the clone_transfer_pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate model object from the following list.
